metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20364 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
LibRaw::copy_bayer in libraw_cxx.cpp in LibRaw 0.19.1 has a NULL pointerdereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20364` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libraw package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3').
ufraw package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
